title: Substitute $$n$$ in the formula
text: Substitute the values $$1$$, $$2$$, $$3$$, $$4$$, and $$5$$ into the formula (the general term of the sequence). For this question, notice the $${\left(-1\right)}^n$$ term will decide if the result is positive or negative

title: Substitute $$n$$ in the formula with $$1$$
text: What's the answer if you substitute $$n$$ with 1?

title: Substitute $$n$$ in the formula with $$2$$
text: What's the answer if you substitute $$n$$ with 2?

title: Substitute $$n$$ in the formula with $$3$$
text: What's the answer if you substitute $$n$$ with 3?

title: Substitute $$n$$ in the formula with $$4$$
text: What's the answer if you substitute $$n$$ with 4?

title: Substitute $$n$$ in the formula with $$5$$
text: What's the answer if you substitute $$n$$ with 5?
